title: Medical Practical Skills Enhancement: Augmented Reality-Based Program for Deaf Students’ Acquisition of Practical Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Through AR-based practical modules, learners can perform essential Technical and Vocational Education and Training (TVET) skills with over 80% accuracy.
Gamification elements can enhance learner engagement by over 70%.
Participants can propose solutions to apply acquired skills to real-world work environments through project-based assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
